Shivah::
"I'm Shivah" said the male answred "We detected your position in our territory" when he had said that words externals defences appeared and  they were ready to open fire "I've showed you our defence in order to show you that we aren't kidding... but we let you speak and heard your ideas, but I advice you, that we aren't in humor to stand any trick... if you try something you will regret it... Now let me heard your propose... and please if you're interesting to get an agreement tell your two friends be out Volcano's area... the lava level are increasing and they could be destroyed..."
The lava level was ingcreasing and soon BlackFortress would be  under the surface of lava
